sentences.sentence: There was the usual clanging and industriousness on the construction sites.
sentences.translation: 建筑嘈杂声和忙碌景象一如既往。

sentences.sentence: I have a good command of computer as well as English due to my industriousness.
sentences.translation: 由于勤奋好学，在学好英语的同求职信格式时，计算机能力也不错。

sentences.sentence: Aunt Harriet could not find words to praise Bessies industriousness and efficiency.
sentences.translation: 哈丽特姑妈不知该用什么言辞来赞扬贝西的勤奋和麻利。
